articles.title: Luna Display launches PC to Mac Mode, 5K support, iPad Magic Keyboard functionality, more - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Luna Display is out today with a sharp update to make it more seamless than ever to use Mac and iPad as secondary displays. Along with the new PC to Mac Mode, Luna now works with up to 5K resolutions, features iPad Magic Keyboard support, and more. Luna Displ…
